name: cassandra
preInstallNotes: Default configuration requires 3 agent nodes each with: 0.5 CPU | 4096 MB MEM | 1 10240 MB Disk
postUninstallNotes:
The DC/OS Apache Cassandra service is being uninstalled.

For DC/OS versions from 1.11 no further action is required. For older DC/OS versions follow the instructions at {{documentation-path}}uninstall to remove any persistent state if required.
